text:
@realDonaldTrump So ALL 50 states being DISASTERS is something you’re proud of?

Your own pandemic expert, Dr. Fauci, just said in effect that if YOU had listened to the experts & acted sooner & agressiveky fewer Americans would have died of #coronavirus 

Please resign!

https://t.co/U3Umz8cbon
